Tim Likes to Teach: Using the Jekyll Assets Plugin→

October 15th, 2013 ∞

I made a quick video tutorial on how to use the Jekyll Assets plugin. It’s super helpful, and allows you to use Sass, Compass, Coffeescript, and other cool stuff.
